item.title: Zelensky ready to join Trump-Putin talks if invited
item.description: The US and Russian presidents announced on Thursday that they planned to meet in Budapest.

item.title: 'It's like a scene from a film' - Paris tourists surprised at Louvre jewel theft
item.description: The Louvre Museum in Paris remains closed to the public after robbers stole imperial jewels in broad daylight on Sunday.

item.title: Everything we know about the Louvre jewellery heist
item.description: The world-famous museum in Paris is still closed on Monday after a masked gang raided one of its galleries.

item.title: Australia accuses China of 'unsafe' military jet manoeuvres
item.description: A Chinese jet allegedly dropped a flare close to an Australian plane over the South China Sea.

item.title: Notorious cyber scam hub linked to Chinese mafia raided
item.description: KK Park has been synonymous with online fraud, money laundering and human trafficking.
